queries package¶

This module is a source of some basic information about the binary protocol.

Most importantly, it contains Query and Response base classes.

class queries.Query(following: list = [], query_id: int = None)¶

Bases: object

to_python(ctype_object)¶

Submodules¶

queries.op_codes module¶

Named constants that represents request operation codes. These are the way of telling Ignite server what one want to do in their request.
